articles.title: OpenAI adopts rival Anthropic’s standard for connecting AI models to data

articles.title: Leaked data exposes a Chinese AI censorship machine
articles.summary: One academic who reviewed the dataset said it was "clear evidence" that China, or its affiliates, wants to use AI to improve repression.

articles.title: Has GetReal cracked the code on AI deepfakes? $18M and an impressive client list say yes
articles.summary: The proliferation of scarily realistic deepfakes is one of the more pernicious by-products of the rise of AI, and falling victim to scams based on these deepfakes is already costing companies milli...

articles.title: Amazon’s Alexa Fund is now backing AI startups

articles.title: Krisp is using AI to help Indians sound like Americans on calls
articles.summary: Audio startup Krisp on Wednesday said it is launching a new feature that uses AI to change a user’s accent during calls. The company is initially rolling out support for changing Indian English acc...

articles.title: SingularityNET and Star Atlas partner to combine Web3 games and AI Agents
articles.summary: SingularityNET, a founding member of the ASI Alliance, has partnered with ATMTA, maker of Star Atlas, the Web3 space exploration online game.

articles.title: Groq and PlayAI just made voice AI sound way more human — here’s how
articles.summary: Groq partners with PlayAI to deliver Dialog, an emotionally intelligent text-to-speech model that runs 10x faster than real-time speech, including the Middle East's first Arabic voice AI model.

articles.title: Observe launches VoiceAI agents to automate customer call centers with realistic, humanlike voices that don’t interrupt

articles.title: Rapt AI and AMD work to make GPU utilization more efficient
articles.summary: Rapt AI, a provider of AI-powered AI-workload automation for GPUs and AI accelerators, has teamed with AMD to enhance AI infrastructure.

articles.title: Microsoft infuses enterprise agents with deep reasoning, unveils data Analyst agent that outsmarts competitors
articles.summary: Microsoft announced Tuesday two significant additions to its Copilot Studio platform: deep reasoning capabilities that enable agents to tackle complex problems through careful, methodical thinking,...

articles.title: How Extropic Plans to Unseat Nvidia
articles.summary: Challenging the world's most successful chipmaker with an entirely new type of computer chip may seem absurd—but it is no more ridiculous than the AI race itself.

articles.title: Databricks Has a Trick That Lets AI Models Improve Themselves
articles.summary: Using several recent innovations, the company Databricks will let customers boost the IQ of their AI models even if they don’t have squeaky clean data.

articles.title: How Software Engineers Actually Use AI
articles.summary: We surveyed 730 coders and developers about how (and how often) they use AI chatbots on the job. The results amazed and disturbed us.

articles.title: Hot New Thermodynamic Chips Could Trump Classical Computers
articles.summary: Guillaume Verdon is building a new kind of chip to accelerate AI. His alter ego wants to accelerate humanity itself.

articles.title: The Quantum Apocalypse Is Coming. Be Very Afraid
articles.summary: What happens when quantum computers can finally crack encryption and break into the world’s best-kept secrets? It’s called Q-Day—the worst holiday maybe ever.
